issue.title: Check that broadcast and multicast packets are counted properly

content.raw: As far as I know the routers never forward broadcast but it might be possible to forward multicast. I believe it depends on the configuration of the network cards on the machines and probably on the configuration on the router. We should take a look at the multicast...
